item.title: Testing Ruby's floats precision
item.description: Float precision in Ruby is a well known quirk. But when testing floats, not many of us bother to remember this and make their tests respectful to this quirk. In this post we will see how the popular Ruby testing frameworks help us test floats properly. Background story Last week I published a post about migrating a test suite from RSpec to Minitest. What was very interesting is that I got a mention on Twitter from Ryan Davis with an offer for a code review of the migration.
